name: Riggy

screenshots.caption: Riggy's main screen while dressed in native Win32 clothes.
Most of Riggy's options can be controlled via this dialog.

short_description: Riggy is a dice `bot for pbIRC RPGs. He is specialized to provide a fair interface for D&D, d20, GURPS, White Wolf, Shadowrun and Mirima Tyalie dice systems. He also includes random name generation and miscellaneous IRC utilities.
